CHAT.comment: Teaching. Mother and Child sit on floor. First Mother teaches Child to string beads; then Mother teaches Child to sort black and white buttons. Child is fairly intelligible.

u.a: starts to put bead in mouth .
sees that it's not a bead and stops .
picks up string and points to bead .
lays string and bead on floor in front of Child .
picks up bead and string Mother put on floor for Child .
pushes string through to other side .
holds out bead and string to M .
picks up a bead for her string .
holds up her string with beads on it .
starts to put bead on string .
picks up other end of string .
tries to put bead on string while Mother holds string .
whispered; hands other end of string to Child .
tries to string bead; then quits .
puts white button in box with black .
puts white button in other box .
drops handful of buttons into box for white; ignores Mother .
puts buttons in any which way .
continues putting buttons in box; ignores Mother .
continues putting buttons in box; ignores Mother .
picks up several buttons; ignores Mother .
dumps handful into one box; ignores Mother .
gathers up buttons that Child has dumped out of boxes .
